Test Name: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm, CALR Mutation Analysis with Reflex to MPL
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow aspirate
Purpose: To detect CALR gene mutations and, if negative, perform reflex testing for MPL mutations in patients with suspected myeloproliferative neoplasms.
Equipment: NanoDrop spectrophotometer, PCR thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus with UV visualization
